DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine recommend dose neoadjuvant capecitabine give together sorafenib tosylate external-beam radiotherapy patient K-ras mutate , locally advanced rectal cancer . ( Phase I ) - Assess efficacy safety regimen patient . ( Phase II ) OUTLINE : This multicenter , phase I , dose-escalation study capecitabine follow phase II study . Patients receive oral capecitabine twice daily oral sorafenib tosylate daily day 1-33 . Patients also undergo external-beam radiotherapy daily day 1-5 , 8-12 , 15-19 , 22-26 , 29-33 . Approximately 6 week completion neoadjuvant therapy , patient undergo surgery . After completion study therapy , patient follow 8 week periodically 3 year .
